title: Best of The Herd for Jul 09, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 09, 2020
description:
Lamar Jackson is great but not even close to Mahomes

Colin disagrees with Kenny Smith saying its easy to score in the NBA now

Jim Harbaugh's comments on playing football during a pandemic

College athletics is a house of cards


Guests: Mark Schlereth, 3x Super Bowl Champion

Antonio Gates, Future Hall of Fame Tight End

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
